preface.title: Preface
preface.para: OpenStack Compute is a compute service that provides server capacity in the cloud. Compute Servers come in different flavors of memory, cores, disk space, and CPU. You can provision servers in minutes. You can interact with Compute through the OpenStack Compute API.

Compute extensions add capabilities to the Compute API. You can use extensions to add features, MIME types, actions, states, headers, parameters, and resources to the core compute API. You can query the compute API to list available extensions: GET v2/extensions
We welcome feedback, comments, and bug reports at bugs.launchpad.net/nova.

section.title: Intended Audience
section.para: This guide assists software developers who develop applications by using the OpenStack Compute API and the Compute extensions.
